cz.syntea.xdef.sys

Class JSONUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.syntea.xdef.sys.JSONUtil
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KXmlConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    XJUtil

    public class JSONUtil
extends java.lang.Object
implements KXmlConstants
    Provides methods for conversion from JSON to XML, conversion from XML to JSON and for comparing of JSON objects.

      • parseJSON

        public static final java.lang.Object parseJSON(java.lang.String source)
                                        throws SException
        Parse JSON document from input source data. The source data may be either file pathname or URL or JSON source.
        Parameters:
        source - file pathname or URL or string with JSON source.
        Returns:
        parsed JSON object.
        Throws:
        SException - if an error occurs.

      • parseJSON

        public static final java.lang.Object parseJSON(java.io.InputStream in)
                                        throws SException
        Parse JSON document from input source data. The input data are in InputStream. The input stream is instanced as character reader reading data from UTF-8 character set.
        Parameters:
        in - input data.
        Returns:
        parsed JSON object.
        Throws:
        SException - if an error occurs.

      • parseJSON

        public static final java.lang.Object parseJSON(java.net.URL in)
                                        throws SException
        Parse source URL to JSON.
        Parameters:
        in - source URL
        Returns:
        parsed JSON object.
        Throws:
        SException - if an error occurs,

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        parsed JSON object.
        Throws:
        SException - if an error occurs,

        Set attribute to element,
        Parameters:

        namespace - namespace URI of attribute.

        val - string with value of attribute.

      • toJSONString

        public static final java.lang.String toJSONString(java.lang.Object obj,
                                                  boolean indent)
        Create JSON string from object. Indentation depends on argument.
        Parameters:
        obj - JSON object.
        indent - if true then result will be indented.
        Returns:
        string with JSON source format.

      • jsonEqual

        public static final boolean jsonEqual(java.lang.Object j1,
                                      java.lang.Object j2)
        Compare two JSON objects.
        Parameters:
        j1 - first object with JSON data.
        j2 - second object with JSON data.
        Returns:
        true if and only if both objects contains equal data.
